ISSUE.TITLE: Provide enough information for the ui to calculate elapsed time for running jobs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea The `started` field for ~running jobs~ **edit:** newly launched jobs is `null`. This field is needed in order to compute and show an accurate playbook run time while the job is running.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5632 from ansible/41_rekey_existing [4.1] Allow rekey with an existing key

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5646 from ansible/5518-userOrgLink Fixes broken user org link
